total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 8s.
Q2: Determine the size of these areas.
Q3: Identify the cells within these areas that contain numbers other than 0.
Q4: Create a new grid with the same size as the identified areas.
Q5: Copy the cells with numbers other than 0 from the input grid to the corresponding positions in the new grid.
Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 8s.
Q2: Extract these areas from the input grid.
Q3: Remove the surrounding 8s from the extracted areas.
Q4: Identify the pattern of the numbers in the extracted areas.
Q5: Apply the identified pattern to the quiz input grid.
Q6: Replace the corresponding areas in the quiz input grid with the patterned areas.
Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 8s.
Q2: Determine the size of these areas.
Q3: Identify the cells within these areas that contain numbers other than 0.
Q4: Create a new grid with the same size as the identified areas.
Q5: Copy the cells with numbers other than 0 from the input grid to the corresponding positions in the new grid.
Q6: Fill the remaining cells in the new grid with 0s.
